title: P1: CareerJourney - Replace detached Tasks with structured concurrency patterns
description: Audit shows many Task { await ... } fire-and-forget in UI (ContentView, JobStore, MapClusteringView). Convert to structured Task.detached(priority:) or actor methods. Prevents leaks/cancellation issues. Refs: greps Task\s*\{ in CareerJourney. Discovered during concurrency audit.

title: P1: Enable strict concurrency in all Xcode projects and capture warnings
description: After CJ-6o5/CJ-dta, build all projects (CareerJourney, ReflectTimer, macOS-Boilerplate, etc.) with STRICT_CONCURRENCY=complete. Log warnings to beads for systematic fixes. Covers SwiftUILab, FoundationLab, etc.

title: Verify accessibility/resize in CareerJourney forms post-refactor
description: Test VoiceOver, high-contrast, window resize. Align w/macOS 26 HIG.

title: Refactor SettingsView: TabView w/SF Symbols icons, @AppStorage prefs, network saves w/ProgressView
description: Match Native Settings/Code/SettingsView: Settings{TabView(selection:){Tab("General", systemImage:"gear")...} .tabViewStyle(.sidebar)}.

title: P0: Enable SWIFT_STRICT_CONCURRENCY = complete and SWIFT_ENABLE_STRICT_CONCURRENCY_CHECKING = YES
description: Add strict concurrency checking to catch actor isolation issues. Critical for macOS 26.
notes: Audit completed: Good actor usage in AsyncDataLoader/LocationGeocoder. Detached Tasks need structured. DTO Sendables pending. MLX exemplary.

title: P2: Implement native chart scrolling in EnhancedStatsView horizontal charts
description: Add .chartScrollableAxes(.horizontal) .chartScrollTargetBehavior(.valueAligned) to CompaniesChart/SalaryDistributionChart/HorizontalStackedBarChartView where categoryCount>10. Add scroll position binding for sync. Match style guide Charts patterns. External ScrollView fallback only if native fails.

title: P1: Add OTHER_SWIFT_FLAGS experimental features (StrictConcurrency=complete, ExistentialAny, InternalConcurrentValueSemantics)
description: Per Xcode 26 baseline settings.

title: P1: CareerJourney - Verify Sendable conformance for DTOs crossing actor boundaries
description: ChartDataCache AsyncDataLoader actor uses T (generic). Ensure DTOs like TimelineData, ChartDataEntry Sendable. Add @unchecked Sendable where needed. Codable structs usually ok. Discovered: actor AsyncDataLoader<T>.

title: Add multi-turn chat support with Transcript management and context summarization
description: Support persistent LanguageModelSession with transcript. Implement auto-summarization when nearing context window like ChatViewModel in Lab.

title: P2: Implement multi-window support like BookClub (WindowGroup(for: ID.self))
description: Support multiple detail windows per item.

title: Migrate CareerJourney to macOS 26 Native Settings/Forms Patterns
description: Apply Native Settings/Code/ patterns: TabView w/icons in Settings, Form sections on 12pt grid w/leading footers, @AppStorage saves w/ProgressView. Covers JobForm, SettingsView.

title: P1: Enable SWIFT_TREAT_WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS=YES, DEAD_CODE_STRIPPING=YES, CLANG_WARN_DOCUMENTATION_COMMENTS=YES
description: Quality gates baseline.

title: Add streaming support to FoundationModelsService with streamResponse
description: Implement async streamResponse(to:generating:) forwarding ExampleExecutor pattern from Foundation Lab. Support AsyncSequence<PartialResult>.

title: Refactor JobForm: macOS 26 Form sections, descriptive leading footers, 12pt grid alignment
description: Study Native Settings/Code/JobForm-like patterns. Use Section{...} footer{Text(...).font(.caption).foregroundStyle(.secondary)}.

title: Epic: Foundation Models Integration following Foundation Lab patterns
description: Epic for full Foundation Models integration into CareerJourney/macOS-26-Boilerplate using LanguageModelSession, streaming, tools, error handling, session/transcript mgmt per Apple sample Foundation Lab and docs. Parent for detailed subtasks.

title: P0: Set SWIFT_VERSION = 6.1 and SwiftLanguageMode.v6
description: Current: 5.0. Enable Swift 6.1 strict concurrency per blueprint. Update pbxproj.

title: P2: Audit UI for macOS 26 Native Style Guide compliance (spacing, toolbars, sidebar bleed, List footers)
description: Reference swift-documentation/macos26-native-style-guide.md. Update layouts, buttonBorderShape, SearchField toolbarRole.browser.

title: Epic: Overhaul CareerJourney to macOS 26 Tahoe Native Standards (Codex)
description: Comprehensive overhaul of CareerJourney app to align with macOS 26 blueprint, Swift 6.1 strict concurrency, Native Style Guide, Apple samples (Fruta/Landmarks/BookClub/AGENTS.md standards). Covers build settings, architecture, UI patterns, concurrency, SwiftData, Foundation Models, testing, automation.

title: P2: Enhance networking to TLS 1.2 min, audit OpenAI/Foundation Models calls
description: Per macOS 26 requirement.

title: P1: Restructure to match macOS 26 Blueprint YAML (App/Core/Features/Infrastructure)
description: Current flat structure. Create Infrastructure/Persistence, Core/Models DTOs Sendable, Services actors, Features/<name>/ViewModels/Views/Tests. Modularize.

title: P1: Implement actor-isolated domain services (DataService, SyncService) with Sendable DTOs
description: Ensure services actor-isolated, models @Model with Sendable DTOs. Concurrency boundaries.

title: P2: MLX-Swift-Audio - Review nonisolated(unsafe) for Sendable wrappers
description: WhisperSTT actor uses nonisolated(unsafe) let model: WhisperModel (MLXArray non-Sendable). Justified but consider Sendable model actor wrapper for distributed actors future. No races seen.

title: P2: Enhance chart cursor interactions and annotation accessibility in EnhancedStatsView
description: Add .chartOverlay for custom hover effects. Ensure all .annotation views have .accessibilityElement(.combine) .accessibilityLabel(value+context). Add ChartCursor modifiers if macOS 26. Verify VoiceOver rotor navigation smooth. Update AccessibilityTests.

title: P1: Migrate all ObservableObject view models/services to @Observable @MainActor
description: e.g. JobStore, AccessibilityManager, ChartDataCache still ObservableObject. Update to modern Observation framework. Audit data flow.

title: Add model.quota tracking and fallback handling
description: Monitor SystemLanguageModel.default.quotas.remainingRequests. Fallback to offline mode or cached responses when quota exceeded.

title: P2: Add project docs: CLAUDE.md style guide ref, README checklist/phases, quality gates YAML
description: Kickoff checklist, Mermaid nav flow, testing coverage >=85%.

title: P1: Add FoundationModelsService with prompt caching, prewarm, quota tracking, fallbacks
description: Abstract AppleFoundationModelService per release notes. Audit logging, no prompt leaks.
notes: Enhanced with sub-tasks from Foundation Lab analysis: streaming, errors, sessions.

title: Implement comprehensive error handling for GenerationError/ToolCallError
description: Map LanguageModelSession.GenerationError (guardrailViolation, exceededContextWindowSize, etc.) and ToolCallError to DomainError enum. User-friendly messages per Lab's handleError.

title: P2: Add validate_architecture.sh script and /build-and-validate, /build-test-deploy commands
description: Per blueprint automation. Check settings, @MainActor views, style guide ref.

title: Update FoundationModelsService to LanguageModelSession with SystemLanguageModel.default
description: Replace FMGenerateTextSession/FMConfiguration with LanguageModelSession(model: .default). Add instructions, guardrails config. Prewarm with promptPrefix.

title: P1: Add AppDelegate.swift for menu/URL handling and Scene/WindowScenes.swift
description: Separate scenes for WindowGroup/Settings. AppDelegate for advanced NSApplicationDelegate. Per blueprint and AGENTS.md.

title: P0: Update MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET to 26.0 in all configurations
description: Current: 14.0/15.4. Required for macOS 26 SDK compliance. Update project.pbxproj and validate build.

title: P2: Add ChartAccessibilityRepresentation proxies to EnhancedStatsView complex charts
description: For stacked/multi-series charts (SalaryDistribution, HorizontalStackedBar, ActivityHeatmap), add .accessibilityRepresentation{ simplified Chart proxy } per Swift-Charts-Examples ScreenTime/GradientLine. Ensure VO rotor navigation. Integrate with existing AXChartDescriptorRepresentable. Update tests.

title: P2: Enhance EnhancedStatsView BarMark charts with RuleMark annotations (thresholds/averages) per Swift-Charts-Examples
description: Add RuleMark overlays to companies/status BarMark charts matching SingleBarThreshold.swift/TimeSheetBar.swift: .annotation(.top/.trailing) with styled Text/VStack(.leading), RoundedRectangle(.ultraThinMaterial), shadows. Include avg applications line. Update CompaniesChart, status dist. Test a11y labels on annotations.
